LogoutSuccess: You have been successfully logged out.
PasswordResetSuccess: Password reset successful. An email has been sent to your registered email address with further instructions.
TokenRefreshSuccess: Token refresh successful. Your authentication token has been successfully refreshed.
VerificationEmailSent: Verification email sent successfully. Please check your email inbox and follow the instructions to verify your account.
EmailAlreadyVerified: Email address has already been verified. Please proceed with your login.
EmailVerifiedSuccessfully: Email address verified successfully. You can now log in.
